DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety fesoterodine overactive bladder symptom improvement add ongoing alpha blocker treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Fesoterodine `` add-on '' Male Overactive Bladder Study
DOC.criteria: Men age 40 year . On stable welltolerated dose alphablocker prescribe LUTS least 6 week prior screen ( Visit 1 ) . Persistent symptom OAB urinary frequency > =8 times/24 hour micturitionrelated urgency episode > =3 episode/24 hour . Contraindication fesoterodine ( antimuscarinics ) . Previous history acute urinary retention require catheterization severe void difficulty judgment investigator , prior baseline . Unable follow study procedure , include completion selfadministered bladder diary patient report outcome questionnaire .
